titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain hydrogenated polymers of norbornene derivatives.
To suspend temporarily the duty on certain hydrogenated polymers of norbornene derivatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain hydrogenated polymers of norbornene derivatives.
